p: Kim and co-workers [ 36] investigated the effect of 83 essential oils on biofilm formation in E. coli O157:H7 bacterial strain. Cinnamon bark, bay, clove, and pimento berry oils exhibited the highest anti-biofilm activity, inhibiting by more than 75% when a concentration of 0,005% ( v/v) was tested. The plant extract of Carex dimorpholepis has also been reported by possess anti-biofilm properties on E. coli O157:H7 [ 37].
